description:
Most authentic Quran app since 2010.

Recognized by more than 65 million Muslim users around the world.

تطبيق القرآن الأكثر اعتمادا منذ عام ٢٠١٠.

معترف به من قبل أكثر من ٦٥ مليون مستخدم حول العالم.

Quran Majeed is an amazing Quran app that beautifies your life with the blessing of reading and listening to the Quran on the go. The latest version of the authentic Quran Majeed app for iPhone and iPad offers complete Quran in the elegant Uthmanic script, audio recitation, translations and English Tafsir Uthmani, proofread by a Muslim scholar ('alim).
القرآن المجيد هو تطبيق مميز للقرآن الذي يجمل حياتك ببركة القراءة والاستماع إلى القرآن أثناء التنقل. الإصدار الأخير من تطبيق القرآن المجيد لأجهزة الآي فون والآيباد تقدم قرآنًا كاملاً في الكتابة العثمانية الأنيقة، وتلاوة الصوت، والترجمات، والتفاسير، وقام بمراجعته أحد العلماء

● Worldwide Prayer Times clock with Azan/Adhan alarm options. Supports different prayer time calculation methods. Qibla direction. Ramadan Sehar/Iftar times
أوقات الصلاة لجميع أنحاء العالم مع خيار تنبيه الأذان، ودعم طرق مختلفة لحساب أوقات الصلاة، وبوصلة القبلة، وأوقات السحور والإفطار

● World famous reciters (Sheikh Abdul Basit, Sheikh As Sudays & As Shraym, Mishari Rashid, Saad Al Ghamdi, Abu Bakr Shatry, Sheikh Ahmed Ajmi, Sheikh Al-Huzaifi, Sheikh Mahir-al-Muayqali, Sheikh Minshawi, Sheikh Ayub, Khalil Husari, Mahmood AlBana, Salah Bukhatir & Sheikh Basfar).
تلاوات القراء المعروفون عالميا.

● Four English translations (Pickthal, Dr. Mohsin, Mahmood & Yusuf Ali) and forty-five language translations (AlBanian, Amazigh, Amharic, Azerbaijani, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Chinese, Divehi, Dutch, French, German, Hausa, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malayalam, Malaysian, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Sindhi, Somali, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Tartar, Turkish, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek). 

● Option to display any translation along with full Arabic text in hi-resolution, Retina graphics in both portrait and landscape viewing. Supports pinch/zoom feature for changing font size.
خيار عرض أي ترجمة مع النص العربي الكامل بالدقة الممتازة في وضعي الأفقي والعمودي، دعم ميزة التصغير / التكبير لتغيير حجم الخط.

● Islamic greeting messages (Eid Mubarak, Ramadan Kareem, ...)
رسائل معايدة إسلامية (عيد مبارك، رمضان كريم، ...)

● Qibla Direction — اتجاه القبلة

● Hijri Converter — تحويل التاريخ

● Quran TV feature with beautiful background videos
تلفزيون القرآن مع مقاطع فيديو خلفية جميلة

● Visual Quran feature with flip gesture
المصحف المرئي مع إيماءة التقليب

● Watch live coverage of Makkah & Madinah.
شاهد التغطية المباشرة لمكة المكرمة والمدينة المنورة.

● Selectable themes (Green, Blue, Classic-Green, Night Mode, Light & Brown).
إمكانية اختيار الثيمات (أخضر، أزرق، الوضع الليلي، فاتح، بني)

● Advanced audio options to help with memorization (repetition of ayah, Surah, number of repetitions, interval, and recitation speed).
خيارات الصوت المتقدمة للمساعدة في الحفظ (تكرار الآية، وسورة، وعدد من حالات التكرار، وفاصل، وسرعة التلاوة).

● Highly advanced “Search” feature that can help with searching any word (search exact word, affixes or all roots) in the Arabic text, any of the translations and English Tafsir.
ميزة بحث متقدم يساعد في البحث عن أي كلمة ( الكلمة بالضبط، كل اللاحقات أو الجذور) في النص العربي، والترجمات والتفاسير

● Bookmarking of Aya, translation and tafsir (supports iCloud synchronization that helps your bookmarks stay up to date on all your iOS devices).
وضع علامة مرجعية على الأية، والترجمة، والتفسير للرجوع إليها

● Quranic Aya and word highlighting during recitation.
تظليل الآية والكلمة أثناء التلاوة

● Social media sharing. Ability to share selected aya via email, twitter & Facebook.
مشاركة في وسائل الإعلام الاجتماعية

● iPad friendly interface
تطابق واجهة أيباد

Terms & Conditions
https://pakdata.com/terms-and-conditions/

Privacy Policy
https://pakdata.com/privacy-policy/

Build a stronger connection with your Deen, one day at a time.

Staying consistent with prayer. Making time to read even one verse a day. Remembering to say Alhamdulillah when life gets heavy. These are the habits that build Iman, and Muslim Pro is here to help you build them.

Whether you’re navigating faith at college, raising a family, or rediscovering prayer, Muslim Pro walks with you, every day, in every season of your Iman.

Designed to help you grow in faith:
- Prayer reminders (Athan) tailored to your location, helping you never miss a Salah
- Daily Quran goals to keep you reading and reflecting
- Track your progress with streaks, reminders, and reflections
- Guided Duas & Azkar, chosen for real-life moments
- Personalised Islamic content that fits your journey, your pace
- Discover halal spots & mosques nearby, even while travelling.
- Learn through short videos, articles & tips, no pressure, just progress

The Complete Qur’an Experience
- All 114 Surahs with audio recitations by renowned Qaris like Mishari Alafasy and Abdul Basit
- Word-by-word translations in English and other languages
- Tajweed color guides and recitation tips to improve your fluency
- Last read verse bookmarks & Ayah highlights
- Memorization mode with repetition, verse selection, and audio speed control
- Light & dark modes, font size adjustments for easier reading
- Verse, Surah, or keyword search
- Authentic Arabic script with Uthmani calligraphy
- Short Tafsir to help reflect on meaning
- Daily Ayah reminders to stay spiritually connected

Small steps lead to lasting change. Muslim Pro helps you stay motivated, feel accountable, and keep growing in your faith, day by day.


Unlock the full Muslim Pro Experience with Premium
Ad-Free Experience: Enjoy uninterrupted access to all features.
Exclusive Tools: Access offline reading, audio recitations, customizable prayer widgets, and interactive lessons.

Premium Subscription Plans
$12.99 per month
$34.99 per year

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing may vary in other countries, and charges may be converted to your local currency.
Subscriptions renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscription and auto-renewal settings in your Apple account.

Supported Languages
Muslim Pro is available in multiple languages, including English, Bahasa Indonesia, Bahasa Melayu, Français, العربية, اردو, and more.

Pro Tips for the Best Experience:
Keep the app updated for the most accurate prayer times and reading features.
Enable auto-location to adjust prayer notifications based on your area.
Open the app daily for seamless access to verified prayer times, Qibla tools, a prayer space finder, and a Halal restaurant finder.

Stay Connected:
Website: muslimpro.com
Instagram: @MuslimProOfficial
TikTok: @MuslimProOfficial
YouTube: MuslimProApp
Facebook: MuslimPro
Twitter/X: @MuslimPro

Discover Muslim Pro – Your trusted app for prayer times, recitations, alerts, Qibla, Halal Finder & more. Perfect your prayer routine and embrace your practice with ease.
Download Muslim Pro today and elevate your experience!

Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

* Entendre la prononciation des mots.

* Créer un nombre illimité de favoris.

* Partagez vos mots favoris sur les réseaux sociaux, par e-mail ou texto.

À propos de Farlex

Comment faisons-nous ?
Farlex est un leader des ressources de référence en ligne. Nous travaillons avec les meilleurs éditeurs pour rassembler des contenus de confiance dans les applis les plus complètes et les plus respectées comme références sur le marché. Notre appli principale est The Free Dictionary (TFD), alimentée par TheFreeDictionary.com.

Millions of Muslims around the world use Muslim Assistant app to see prayer times and find Qibla direction.

Muslim Assistant, the most downloaded prayer time application in all Muslim countries, includes many useful features.

MUSLIM ASSISTANT FEATURES

Prayer Times: The application shows you the most accurate azan times according to your location or region. If you want, you can receive prayer time notifications with Azan sound or with other sound options.

Qibla Finder: You can find Mecca and Kaaba on the map, and you can determine the Kaaba direction of your location in the most accurate way. With the help of Compass Mode, It is easy to see where the Kaaba is located even when you are offline, and you can pray according to Islamic rules.

Dhikr Counter: You can easily make dhikrs, record your dhikr counts and dhikr loops.

Friday Messages: You can send special Friday messages to your loved ones.

Nearby Mosques: You can see the Mosques and Masjids closest to your location on the map.

The Quran: You can read the Quran in 40+ different languages and there are also transliteration options. You can see the Juz list and change the text size as well. You have the option to listen to the Quran recited by famous reciters, providing a unique and diverse listening experience.

Kaaba Live Broadcast: You can watch the Kaaba live 24 hours a day.

Esma-ul Husna: You can see the 99 names of Allah and their meanings and listen to Esma hymn and make dhikr of each Name.

Hijri Calendar: You can follow the dates of important islamic days such as Ramadan, Laylat-ul Qadr, Eid al-Fitr and Eid al-Adha.

Message Editor: You can choose existing messages or compose new ones, with a variety of background options, using the editor tool and send your custom messages to your loved ones.

Notes:

For proper Qibla Finder usage, you need to hold your phone on a flat surface and keep it away from electromagnetic fields and metal objects. If it is necessary, you can manually rearrange your location through pressing the marker.

Because the app uses your device's location settings to give you prayer times, please kindly be aware your location settings are open and up to date.

May Allah bless us all.

تطبيق مساعد المسلم هو الأفضل لتذكير المسلم بالواجبات اليومية: أوقات الصلاة، إتجاه القبلة، كما يحتوي أيضا على القرآن الكريم، الذِكر، محرر الرسائل، رسائل يوم الجمعة، تقويم رمضان وأوقات الإفطار والسحور، وأكثر من ذلك انه مثالي لواجباتك الإسلامية، فأنه تطبيق إسلامي متكامل.

----------------------------------------

If you choose to purchase Muslim Assistant Premium, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase. Current Muslim Assistant Premium subscription price starts at $2.49 USD/month and one-month(Monthly Auto - Renewal) and twelve-month(Yearly Auto - Renewal) or Lifetime (One Time Purchase) packages are available. There is free trial for yearly subscriptions, subscription begins immediately but billed when the trial is over. Prices are in US dollars, may vary in countries other than the US and are subject to change without notice. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Muslim Assistant Premium, you can simply continue using Muslim Assistant for free.

This application is subject to Apple's Standard End User License Agreement (EULA).
Privacy and Terms: https://www.muslimassistant.com/privacy-terms.html

Get God’s Word for free on your devices with the Bible App by YouVersion. Connect with God through Scripture by reading, listening, Plans, Daily Refresh, Verse of the Day, and so much more!

Choose from 1,750+ languages and 2,500+ Bible versions. Make it your Bible by adding Friends, choosing Plans, creating Verse Images, highlighting, and making notes.

Bring your friends with you and explore the Bible together. Have honest conversations about Scripture. Grow together and share what you discover.

People are reading, listening to, watching, and sharing the free Bible App by YouVersion on over 500 million devices worldwide. Join the global Community today! Download the Bible App.


EXPLORE GOD’S WORD
* Choose from thousands of Bible versions in over 1,750 languages
* Pick from over 60 languages for your Bible App interface
* Download select Bible versions to access when you’re offline
* Listen to select Bible versions and enjoy skip, playback speed, and timer controls.
* Learn more about the Verse of the Day in Guided Scripture with an engaging video and personal reflection questions
* Tap through Scripture and prayer prompts in Guided Prayer, or write your own prayers using the Prayer feature
* Choose from thousands of Plans that focus on specific topics, portions of Scripture, or the entire Bible in a year
* Watch videos from Christian organizations such as Bible Project and The Chosen
* Search for what the Bible says about any topic you’re wondering about
* Tap on a verse to see your Notes and related content such as videos, Plans, and study notes

MAKE IT YOUR BIBLE
* Themes let you select a color palette for your entire Bible App experience
* Create and download Verse Images for any verse you’d like—it’s shareable art
* Highlight with custom colors and create notes
* Bookmark passages to share, memorize, and keep at the front of your mind
* Share verses with friends using social media, email, or text
* Add notes on any verse—make them private or let your Friends see them
* Access your account from any supported device
* Adjust lighting, font, font size, and line spacing for easy reading

BRING YOUR FRIENDS ALONG
* Center your friendships around Scripture by adding your Friends to the Bible App
* See an activity feed that shows what you and your Friends are noting, bookmarking, and highlighting
* Comment on the Verse of the Day with your Friends—ask questions and share how God is speaking to you
* Write your own prayers and share them with your Friends to pray together
* Do Plans together and discuss what you’re learning

CONNECT WITH YOUVERSION
* Contact Support from inside the Bible App
* Join the @youversion Community on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok & Pinterest
* Catch up on the latest at blog.youversion.com
* Access the Bible online at bible.com

Download the world’s #1 Bible App and enjoy the Bible experience loved by millions!

Quran Pro app is a collection of the best Quran reciters in the world, an amazing user interface design, and the best set of features.

Quran Pro app is FREE without any limitation.

With the Quran Pro app you can do: 

• Translations
Read the Holy Quran in Arabic alongside its translation ( French, English, Malay, Dutch, Italian, Spanish, or even have explanation and meaning). We support 30 languages in total.

• Bookmarks
You can bookmark your favorites surat and reciters from the player view

• Offline mode
Download recitations, playlists, and tracks, and bring your Quran with you anywhere using our offline mode. Download all the surats or one by one surat.

• Favorites
Create your personal Quran collection simply by marking playlists as your favorite.

• Multi-Platforms
Thanks to the technology Quran Pro supports AirPlay and CarPlay.

• Audio features​
Play audio in the background while you're using your iPhone/iPad. Repeat, shuffle, ​and timer functions are also included

• Today's Extension (Widget)​
The app offers a widget with your recently played audios.

• Design
The app has been redesigned to be faster, simpler, snappier UI, and more beautiful. In addition to optimized for Retina display on the new iPhone/iPad.

• Various Reciters:
All the most popular reciters are in the app, you can find the following names:
- A­bdul Rahman Al ­Soudais عبد الرحمن السديس
- Maher Al Mueaqly - ماهر المعيقلي
- Saoud Al Shuraim سعود الشريم
- Abdul Baset Abdel-Samad عبد الباسط عبد الصمد
- Mishary Rashid Alafasy - مشاري بن راشد العفاسي
- Saad El Ghamidi - سعد الغامدي
- Fatih Seferagic فاتح سفيرافيك
- And more.

REQUIREMENTS 
- The application requires an internet connection with WiFi or 3G/4G for use in case you have not to download surat.

If you have any feedback, comments or issues? Please contact us directly

CarPlay® and AirPlay® are is a software feature and an Apple trademark.

Download Quran Pro today and enjoy listening to the best reciters in the world.

Privacy policy: https://quranpro.co/privacy
Terms of use: https://quranpro.co/terms


تطبيق القرآن هو مجموعة من أفضل قراء القرآن في العالم. تصميم مبسط ومريح واجهة المستخدم مع مجموعة متنوعة من الميزات الجديدة.
 
تطبيق القرآن هو مجاني

مع تطبيق القرآن الكريم يمكنك:
 
+ قراءة القرآن باللغة العربية مع ترجمتها (الإنجليزية أو الفرنسية أو تفسير المعنى مع تفسير الجلالين)
+ حفظ السور المفضلة لديك وكذا الفراء
+ تحميل تلاوة السور والاستماع متواجد حاليا
+ تحميل كل أو السورة
+ تحميل تلاوات أكثر من 23 قارئ
+ إرسال للعائلة والأصدقاء
+  أدعية قرآنية
+ تشغيل الصوت في الخلفية أثناء استخدام جهاز اي فون / آي باد
+ توطيد: الآن أسرع وأبسط وأكثر حيوية  واجهة المستخدم ذات هندسة رائعة .
+ الآن يمكن تشغيل التطبيق على اي فون / آي باد ريتينا
 
متطلبات
- يتطلب التطبيق اتصال بالإنترنت مع واي فاي WiFi أو الجيل الثالث 3G للاستخدام في حال كنت لم يتم تحميل السور.
 
 
لديك تعليقات أو أسئلة؟ يرجى الاتصال بنا مباشرة
 
لا تنسون من صالح الدعاء
 
 نسأل الله تعالى أن يمنحنا الإخلاص في النية والرحمة وتوحيد جميع المسلمين تحت راية النبي محمد صلى الله عليه وسلم، وأن نكون من بين الفائزين يوم القيامة.

قم بتنزيل القرآن الكريم اليوم واستمتع بالاستماع إلى أفضل القراء في العالم.

سياسة الخصوصية: https://quranpro.co/privacy
شروط الاستخدام: https://quranpro.co/terms

Azkar App is your daily companion for enhancing spirituality and facilitating Islamic practices. It provides a comprehensive collection of authentic Athkar (remembrances) and supplications from the Qur’an and Sunnah, along with innovative features designed to meet the needs of Muslims in their daily lives.

Join millions of users and experience a complete spiritual journey with Azkar App, crafted to serve every Muslim.

Key Features
- Morning & Evening Athkar, Sleep & Wake-up Athkar, Prayer Athkar, and more: A modern and user-friendly interface with an audio player and repetition counter.
- My Athkar Section: Create and customize your own Athkar according to your needs.
- Qur’an (Reading, Tafsir, and Audio): Enjoy an eye-friendly reading experience with font and color customization, translations in multiple languages, and easy-to-understand Tafsir. You can also listen or download recitations by your favorite reciter.
- Khatmah: Set a Qur’an completion plan with daily reading reminders.
- Prayer Times, Qibla Direction, and Hijri Calendar: View the Islamic calendar, accurate prayer times, and Qibla direction, with a monthly prayer calendar that can be shared.
- Adhan & Full Adhan Alerts: Choose from a variety of Adhan voices with pre-Adhan reminders.
- Reminders Section: Create reminders for specific Athkar, supplications, or important events with customizable sound and repetition options.
- Daily Content Updates: Get Dua of the Day, Ayah of the Day, and Video of the Day with valuable tips and inspiring stories.
- Various Azkar: A variety of supplications with customizable backgrounds, ready for sharing.
- Ramadan Section: Essential Ramadan features including Prayer & Fasting Tracker, Daily Duas, Zakat Calculator, and more.
- Daily Quranic Benefits: Daily insights into Qur’anic verses for contemplation.
- Worship Trackers: Tools to track Athkar, fasting, and prayers, helping you stay consistent and improve commitment.
- Tasbih Counter: Perform electronic Dhikr with an easy-to-use digital Tasbih.
- Ruqyah (Islamic Healing): Authentic Ruqyah texts from the Qur’an and Sunnah, with an audio listening option.
- Prophet Muhammad’s (PBUH) Biography in Videos: Engaging video content about the life of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH).
- 99 Names of Allah.
- Surah Al-Kahf Reminder for Fridays.
- Hajj & Umrah Guide: Step-by-step instructions for performing Hajj and Umrah.
- Islamic & Ramadan WhatsApp Stickers: Updated Islamic and Ramadan sticker packs with easy export to WhatsApp.
- Istighfar (Forgiveness) Alerts: Get reminders for seeking forgiveness and making Dhikr at customizable intervals (e.g., every 10 minutes or once a day).
- Qiyam-ul-Layl (Night Prayer) Alerts.
- Live Activities & Widgets: Quick access to features like prayer times, Hijri date, various azkar, Khatmah, prayer tracker, fasting tracker, and more from the home screen and lock screen.
- Professional & Customizable Design: Choose your favorite background, and enable dark mode for a better visual experience.
- …and many more great features you’ll love!

Why Azkar App?
Azkar App is a comprehensive Islamic tool, combining authenticity with modern technology to fulfill your spiritual and daily needs.

Take this opportunity to increase your daily rewards and strengthen your connection with Allah. Download Azkar App now and embark on an uninterrupted spiritual journey filled with Dhikr and supplication.

DIC-o French - English and English - French off-line dictionary with pronunciations (61000 translations).

Dictionnaire Bilingue Haoussa-Français et Français-Haoussa :

- Accès instantané à la traduction

Daily Supplications enables you to read and listen to more than 300 different islamic duaas everyday. It also features prayer times, Hijri date, qibla and custom reminders to give you the right supplication at the right time.


Main features:

• Duaas and Hadiths to read everyday with counters to help you keep track of what you've read (click on the counter each time you read a supplication. The app will save the number of times you've read a supplication and reset the counters  at midnight).
• Supplications to read on special occasions.
• Salat times with auto calculation depending on your location (you can choose your city manually or by GPS).
• Step by step Prayer tutorial.
• Quran.
• Qibla.
• Tasbih.
• 99 Names of Allah.
• Tracker.
• Reminder for fasting supplications when Maghrib prayer in Ramadhan.
• The app can help you read and finish the Quran during Ramadhan.
• Supplications' audio. The audio can be downloaded and cached for offline playback (read a supplication the first time with internet, so that it is cached for offline playback later).
• Translation, Transliteration & References for all the supplications.
• Translation & Transliteration for the Quran (can be enabled from the settings).
• Widget for daily supplications.
• The possibility to mark supplications as favorite so you can find them easily.
• A search functionality to easily find the right supplication in no time.
• Alarms to remind you of your daily supplications (these alarms can be deactivated from the settings).
• Custom reminders to help you do your important tasks (read sourat AlKahf every Friday or fast on Mondays and Thursdays for example) or to remind you of a certain supplication at a certain time.
• Notifications at Salat times with the possibility to choose from different athans.
• Islamic Calendar (Hijri Date) with the different Islamic events.

The App, the Quran, the adhkars and duaas are entirely translated to English, French, German, Portuguese, Spanish, Indonesian, Turkish, Italian and Arabic.

Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/dailyislamicduaas

Le Coran en français se veut être une aide précieuse à tout étudiant ou fidèle assidu à la lecture du Saint Coran ! 

Le Coran contient des valeurs universelles qui nous sont enseignées par Le Très-Haut Lui-même. Il est le guide principal, la source d'enseignement et de soutien pour tous fidèles qui essaient de le lire et de le comprendre où qu'ils se trouvent.

Le Coran est le texte sacré de l'islam. Pour les musulmans, il reprend verbatim la parole de Dieu (Allah). Le Coran reste le premier et le plus ancien livre connu en arabe à ce jour. La tradition musulmane le présente comme le premier ouvrage en arabe, avec le caractère spécifique d'inimitabilité dans la beauté de sa structure et dans ses principes moraux et éthiques. Le Coran est parfois appelé al-kitāb (« le Livre »), adh-dhikr (« le Rappel ») ou encore al-furqān (« le Discernement »). 

Le Coran audio.
Notre application vous permet d'écouter la parole d'Allah. Accédez à la meilleure expérience d’écoute du Coran.

Podcast du Coran.
Le podcast du Coran stimulera votre croissance spirituelle en vous aidant à comprendre et à appliquer la Parole d'Allah à votre vie et à celle de votre famille.

Qu'Allah ouvre les portes de Sa Connaissance à travers Son Livre Saint à chacun de nous, et qu'Il fasse de nous de bonnes personnes, qui embrassent la Vérité et la Patience des uns avec les autres.

Traduisez des mots et des expressions courantes du français à l'anglais OU de l'anglais au français ! Le dictionnaire bilingue français-anglais de Farlex vous fournit instantanément des traductions avec recherche vocale ou texte, plus l'accès à la prononciation audio, des définitions, des exemples de phrases et bien plus encore !

* Tapez le mot recherché ou utilisez la fonctionnalité native de recherche vocale et prononcez simplement le mot que vous souhaitez traduire.

* Traduction hors ligne ! Accédez à des traductions mot à mot sans internet.

* Écoutez la prononciation de mots, d'expressions courantes et de questions (mode en ligne uniquement). 

* Pour prononcer comme si c'était votre langue maternelle !

* Trouvez le mot juste. Lisez les définitions et les exemples de phrases pour choisir la meilleure traduction.

* Sauvegardez un nombre illimité de favoris pour accéder rapidement à tous vos mots enregistrés.

* Passez du mode traduction français-anglais au mode anglais-français en un seul geste.

* Options de recherche avancée.

* Partagez vos mots favoris sur les réseaux sociaux, par e-mail ou texto.

* Facile d'utilisation ! Idéal en voyage ou pour apprendre une nouvelle langue.

À propos de Farlex

Comment faisons-nous ?
Farlex est un leader des ressources de référence en ligne. Nous travaillons avec les meilleurs éditeurs pour rassembler des contenus de confiance dans les applis les plus complètes et les plus respectées comme références sur le marché. Notre appli principale est The Free Dictionary (TFD), alimentée par TheFreeDictionary.com.

description:
Yandex.Translate
Free translator that can work offline and translate text from photos

• Translate between any pair of the 100 languages when you’re online. 
• Translate from French, German, Italian, Russian, Spanish, Turkish and other languages to English while offline: download these languages for free and enable the offline mode in Settings.
• Speak words or phrases in Russian, English, or Turkish to translate them into any of these languages, or have the app read the translations to you.
• Learn new words and their meanings through usage examples in the app’s dictionary (available for most of the currently supported languages).
• Take a picture of a menu, road sign, book page or choose a photo with text from your Camera Roll to view its translation right over the image (only available when you are online).
• Translate entire sites directly in the app or in Safari.
• Read books, news, or articles in a foreign language together with Yandex.Translate on your iPad using Split View. 
• Read transliterated Arabic, Armenian, Farsi, Georgian, Greek, Hebrew, Korean, Japanese, or Chinese Pinyin.
• Enjoy the app’s time-saving predictive typing function and automated language detection.
• Save translations in Favorites and view your translation history at any time.
• Speak to your Apple Watch to see your words translated on its screen.

Currently supported languages: Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Bashkir, Belarussian, Bengali, Bulgarian, Burmese, Bosnian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chinese, Chuvash, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Elvish (Sindarin), English, Esperanto, Estonian, Farsi, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hebrew, Hill Mari, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean, Kyrgyz, Latin, Latvian, Lao, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malaysian, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mari, Mongolian, Nepali, Norwegian, Papiamento, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Scots, Singhalese, Slovakian, Slovenian, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Udmurt, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Xhosa, Yakutian, Yiddish, Zulu.

Voice translation was never so easy! Travel around the world and easily communicate in any country – Voice Translator will instantly pronounce translated phrases on-the-fly! Can’t read the menu items in a fancy foreign restaurant? Those days are history now with instant camera translation!

Communicate freely at the airport, hotel, gas station, supermarket or any other place. Read street signs in a foreign country, translate manuals of your overseas purchases or the text of any picture you already have in your phone. Just put your personal interpreter into a pocket and use it for your all translating needs!

Voice Translator is an essential learning tool for kids and adults – learn new phrases and listen to the correct pronunciation.

Coran Kamil Mp3 est une application conçue pour faciliter la lecture et l’écoute du Saint Coran sur iPhone et iPad. Elle offre un accès privilégié aux récitations des plus grands réciteurs du monde, avec la possibilité de sélectionner et d’enregistrer vos préférés pour une écoute simplifiée.

Pour ceux qui préfèrent la lecture, l’application met à disposition le texte du Coran, accessible même hors ligne. Son interface intuitive et épurée garantit une expérience fluide et agréable.

Une sélection de 26 réciteurs renommés, choisis pour la qualité de leurs récitations, est disponible :
Abderrahman Al Soudais, Saad El Ghamidi, Mishary Rashid Alafasy, M. Khalil Al Hussary, Abdelbasset Abdessamad, Maher Al Mueaqly, Ahmed Al Ajmi, Abu Bakr Al Shatri, Fares Abbad, Adel Al Kalbani, M. Seddik El Menchaoui, Hatem Farid Al-Waa’ir, Saoud Shuraim, Abdallah Matroud, Nasser Al Qatami, Yasser Al Dossari, Abdullah Al Juhani, Idriss Abkar, Wadi Al Yamani, Ali Jaber, Alzain Mohamed Ahmed, Omar Al Kazabri, Khalid Al Jalil, Abdelrahman Jamal Aloosi et Ali Al Houdaifi.

As-salāmu ‘alaykum,

Welcome to the Dhikr & Dua app by Life With Allah, a da‘wah initiative of Ummah Welfare Trust.

A beautiful app with a stunning modern design to help you read dhikr and duas on a daily basis and on key occasions.

The app is totally FREE with NO annoying ads.

Wide Selection
The app features a collection of 500+ du‘ās and dhikr, each of them carefully assigned to a relevant category.

Easy Navigation
The app provides easy navigation through the various collections of duas & dhikr. Just swipe left and right to go to the next or previous dhikr & du‘a. Or go immediately to your preferred dhikr or du‘a by using the index page. 

Translation, Transliteration, Hadith/Virtue
Each dhikr and dua features the above so you can help you read and understand what you are reading. The explanation of each dua and dhikr is coming soon inshallah.

Audio
Running out of time? Find it difficult to read the Arabic? We’ve got you covered. Listen to each du‘a and dhikr individually or simply play the whole collection!

Articles
Over 100 articles on dhikr, dua, the Qur’an, ruqyah and more, for you to read from.

Emotions
Feeling anxious or angry? Confused or worried? You can now select whatever emotion you’re feeling and recite the du‘a related to it.

Daily Reminder
The daily reminders which are shared on our social media platforms will also be made available for users on the app. Simply go to the ‘Daily Reminder’ tab to view and share.

Share
Share your favourite dua or dhikr as text and also as an image.

Counter
Each dua or dhikr which needs to be recited multiple times will have a dedicated counter.
A separate stand-alone counter. Simple and easy to use. Just select the preset amounts or choose your custom amount and tap away!

Customisation
Find the Arabic hard to read? Is reading on a screen too difficult? You can change the font of the Arabic text to whatever suits you best. Audio too fast or too slow? Customise the speed of the audio to whatever you're most comfortable with.


Publications
Download a range of FREE publications which are also available on lifewithallah.com

MORE EXCITING FEATURES COMING SOON INSHALLAH.


Please rate the app and share it with your loved ones if you find it beneficial.

If you find any errors or bugs, please let us know by emailing feedback@lifewithallah.com with the details.

Quran Companion is the smartest way to memorize the Quran. With scientifically-backed learning techniques and games, memorizing the Quran is more effective, easy, fun & social!

Perfect for the everyday, busy Muslim who desires an easier, more accessible way to build a Quran memorization habit in their daily life and achieve their memorization goals faster and easier.

Featured in major press outlets:

A lot more media…

Join thousands of other users and reach your Quran memorization goals.

We’ll be adding language support in multiple languages in an update

********************
Special Features
********************
* Group challenges to connect and memorize together with friends in a supportive social environment
* Customizable display options of Madina/Uthmani or Urdu 13 lines script (15, 16 lines per page are coming soon), endless scrolling or single page display.
* 15 different audio recitations and 10 different translations.
* Audio recitation of ayah on loop from 1 up to 10 times, or infinite loop, to practice memorization.
* “Swipe to Reveal” game reveals the hidden ayah as your finger slides across it -- a fun way to practice reciting from memory while checking for any mistakes.
* “Hasanah Calculator” shows your progress in Hasanah points (calculation based on Sahih hadith).
* Recording: Listen to your own progress by recording your memorization.

***********************
Upcoming features
***********************
* “Daily Hasanah Leaderboard” keeps you motivated and inspired.
* Guided lesson plans that can be customized to your individual goals, ability and schedule.
* A powerful analytics dashboard that shows your memorization progress at a glance. 
* Launching multiple translations soon and audio will be available for download
